titles.title: Sing, O Sing, This Blessed Morn

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sing, O sing, this blessed morn, Unto us a Child is born, Unto us a Son is giv'n, God Himself comes down from Heav'n. Sing, O sing, this blessed morn, Jesus Christ today is born.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus Christ, the King of kings, Maker of all worldly things, Now descends from Heav'n to Earth, To re-store us by His birth; Sing, O sing, this blessed morn, Jesus Christ today is born.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: God of God, and Light of Light, Comes with mercies infinite; Joining in a wondrous plan Heav'n to earth and God to Man; Sing, O sing, this blessed morn, Jesus Christ today is born.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: God with us, Emmanuel, Deigns for ever now to dwell; He on Adam's fallen race Sheds the fullness of His Grace; Sing, O sing, this blessed morn, Jesus Christ today is born.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Truth and Mercy show their face, And with loving kiss embrace; Righteousness looks down from Heav'n, God is pleased and Man forgiv'n; Sing, O sing, this blessed morn, Jesus Christ today is born.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
God comes down that man may rise, Lifted far above the skies
He is Son of Man, that we Sons of God in Him may be;

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Human flesh is now become Christ's abode, the Godhead's home;
Royal Palace, sacred shrine For the Majesty Divine;

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Now we rise, from prison free; On we march to victory,
Joyful banners are unfurled; 'Tis the Birthday of the World;

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Now behold the rising Sun Hath His glorious race begun;
Now the Bridegroom from above Weds the Bride, with heavenly love;

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
O renew us, Lord, we pray, With Thy Spirit day by day;
That we ever one may be With the Father, and with Thee;

verse.name: v11
